title: Chickpea, Spinach and Bratwurst Hotpot
directions: Heat oil in a big non-stick casserole pan over medium heat. Cook onion for 4 minutes. Add garlic, cook for 1 extra minute
Add chopped tomato and bay leaf to the pan, cook for 3 minutes stirring occasionally. Add paprika, chickpeas and bratwurst sausages. Combine
Pour in stock. Cook for 10 minutes. Discard bay leaf
Take out about 1/4 cup of chickpeas with some broth, process until smooth. Return mixture to the pan. Add spinach, cook for 1 minute
Pour in beaten egg slowly while stirring. Check seasoning
Serve hotpot in warmed bowls, topped sliced sausages
ingredients: 2 x 390g (13 oz) cans chickpeas, drained & rinsed
120g (4 oz) baby spinach (or the same amount of thawed chopped frozen spinach)
